product_name: REI Quartz Peak Fleece Jacket - Boys'
long_description: The heavy-weight REI Quartz Peak fleece jacket is sure to keep boys warm during their cold-weather activities. Thick, breathable fleece dries quickly, insulates even when damp and resists pilling; internal Teddy Bear fleece is extra soft and warm. 3-panel hood helps minimize the chill. Full-length front zipper features a chin guard at the top. Zippered hand pockets help keep hands toasty warm while a zippered chest pocket stows small essentials.
short_description: The heavy-weight REI Quartz Peak fleece jacket is sure to keep boys warm during their cold-weather activities.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
